probe_explanation: These are LIE_DETECTOR scores. IMPORTANT: Higher numbers mean more deceptive (closer to 0 or positive). Lower numbers mean less deceptive (more negative). For example: -10 is MORE deceptive than -50. Think of it like a number line: the scores closer to 0 (or positive) indicate more deception patterns. Focus on players with scores CLOSEST TO ZERO as potential werewolves. The detector is experimental and may produce errors.
